title: Payback - an e-commerce site
description: This pet project is an e-commerce store where users can buy and sell products. In addition, users can leave reviews of purchased products and communicate with each other using the built-in messenger.

title: Employment Agency - a coursework
description: This project was necessary to complete the university course "Databases". I wrote almost the entire front end of the site using vanilla JavaScript, which allowed me to deepen my knowledge of this programming language and served as a good basis for studying frameworks such as React.

title: Navigatio - a CLI app
description: This application allows you to quickly navigate between folders. It supports commands such as creating an alias for a folder, deleting an alias, cancelling previous commands and more. This app is also available for two operating systems: Windows and Linux.
